content: size approx 190 x 20 cm / 75 x 8 materials drops alpaca from garnstudio 100 g colour no 0100 off-white and use drops vivaldi from garnstudio 100 g colour no 06 off-white drops crochet hook size 5 mm / h or size needed to obtain the correct gauge drops crochet hook size 10 mm / n/p for lace border
